# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#16)

#### [NepeneÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fp780?context=3)

Have you ever considered releasing a Mistborn cardgame?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, but the logistics of it are just so difficult that I don't know if it would ever happen.
